contents.item: Your calling is in what you can do without noticing time
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
A selfish living is a wasteful living
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
Your calling is buried in your background on earth
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
Work to fulfill destiny
God needs are in the needs of people
To live a selfish life is the fastest track to catastrophe
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
Reproduce yourself and fulfill your calling
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
There is no communication with God without communication with God’s people
Man is the carrier of God’s image
Love others the way God loves you
God can only relate effectively with you when you relate with people
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
Your net worth depends on your added value
No amount of money can compensate losing your purpose
Be eager to explore new discoveries
Effectiveness of love must be measured by concrete results
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
When you celebrate a person, you are celebrating the creator of that person
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
A life without increase, production and multiplication is a wasted one
We are all equal in the sight of the creator
We are all called to promote God’s Kingdom on earth
Time is the raw material for creation
To be productive, you have to stop being absent-minded
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
Life shouldn’t be about survival alone but about living
Serving people with love and compassion is the best way to bring them to Christ
Be organized in maximizing time
Become great through the currency of time
Don’t waste time on employment, discover yourself today
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
God is waiting on you to believe that you are capable
You only gain in life when you multiply
Don’t fellowship with people around you alone, explore and reach out to more people
Purpose is the most important thing worth living for
The effectiveness of your life is determined by your ability to convert your time into values
You need to combine your calling with your passion
Work is designed to be in your own field of calling
People-based service is God-based service
Love is about self-denial
Reconsider your life and see how you can make things work for yourself
Learn to do everything with speed to be efficient and effective
You cannot understand God without understanding people
The value of a substance is the product of the time spent to achieve it
You are at liberty to develop yourself when you are self employed
Your destiny is connected with your calling
Employment sells out the essence of life
You can only prove your love to God when you love people that do not deserve your love
Love is the primary nature of God
Always live in the here and now
Reflect and meditate on yourself and discover ways to multiply yourself
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
All products are a multiplication of time invested
Every service is a product of double honor
You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
Always ask yourself if you are really serving God
The service of God is in people
No amount of money can recover lost time
Time is the content of life
When you begin to serve people, God begins to serve you
Our target as believers is to live an effective life, not just a long one
You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.
Joblessness brings you face to face with destiny
See the light in losing your employment
Survival isn’t all there is to life
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
Your calling is your natural area of concentration
No amount of service we do can impress God, only our service to ordinary people can
The best kind of happiness is a habit you're passionate about.
Being married or having children does not mean you are living an effective life
You can only be fulfilled in life when you achieve your purpose
You are living to the fullest when you live to discover and fulfill your purpose
Greatness is an attainment bought with the currency of time
Glorifying people is the most noble act
Life evolved from time
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
An effective life is a fulfilled one
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
Life is all about discovery
Money does not determine our worth
Work is the major instrument for conversion
The material of life is made from time
